title: Later in life
creator_credit: Robert Hill, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: In Robert Hill’s family, three of them have a disability, all diagnosed later in life. Despite their various stuggles, the Hill family have pulled each other through and will continue to do so.
